recipes.name: Russian Salad
instructions: Boil potatoes and carrots.
Cut apple, potato and carrot into cubes.
Combine boiled carrot, boiled potatoes, apple, walnut, raisin, black pepper, mayonnaise and cream in a bowl and mix well.
Serve the delicious Russian salad with grilled chicken and zeera pulao.
To serve, garnish with lettuce leaf, sliced cucumber and long slices of carrot.
Tips: Boiled green peas or boiled chicken can also be added to the salad.

recipes.name: Turkish Couscous Salad
instructions: In a large bowl put couscous add salt, paprika, cumin powder and mix well with spoon.
Add boiling water that covers the couscous stir spoon to incorporate, cover and leave for 10 minutes.
Mix with fork and add onion, tomato, cucumber, red chili, olive oil, coriander, mint, parsley, black pepper, lemon juice and zest mix all ready to serve.

recipes.name: Orange Chicken Salad
instructions: Cut oranges into half and scoop out segments carefully so segments do not get mushy keep a side orange's both shell.
Cut fine chunks of orange segments and combine all ingredients in a large bowl except leaves.
Arrange spinach and lettuce on two plates and put orange shells on the centre of both plates like a bowl.
Fill orange shells with salad sprinkle grated cheese and freshly ground black pepper

recipes.name: Blueberry Orange and Spinach Salad
instructions: Line baking tray with parchment paper now lay foil paper on tray.
In a bowl mix pecans and syrup well and spread coated pecans on the foil and sprinkle ½ tsp of sugar on pecans and now bake till 7 minutes or roast well. Remove and let them cool completely.
For Salad Dressing: In a bowl add vinegar, oil, orange juice and 1 tbsp of sugar whisk all till creamy dressing is ready. Set aside.
In a serving large bowl put orange, blueberries and spinach pour over dressing and toss well sprinkle roasted pecans and serve.

recipes.name: Winter Crunch Salad
instructions: Cut apple into thin wedges, trim radish and cut in quartered also separate chicory into leaves.
In a large bowl toss celery, nuts, radish, apples and chicory.

Take half of garlic bread and make slices of it keep a side and make small chunks of remaining bread and add into salad bowl top with cheese chunks pour dressing and honey toss well to incorporate well.
Ready for serve with garlic bread slices.

recipes.name: Layered Salad
instructions: Cut potato, carrot and egg in cube shape.
In a bowl first set layer of boiled potato, then chicken; add some mayonnaise and sprinkle black pepper.
Now layer eggs, mayonnaise, carrot and cover with thin layer of mayonnaise.
Chill in fridge and turn over salad on plate and serve or serve as it is in the bowl.

recipes.name: Cucumber & Peanut Fantasy Salad
instructions: Peel and cut cucumber into tiny square pieces.
Take a large bowl add cucumber and peanuts.
Add seasonings mix well and serve.

recipes.name: American Corn Salad
ingredients: Capsicum chopped into tiny cubes ½ cup
Tomatoes chopped into tiny cubes ½ cup
Cucumber chopped in tiny cubes 1 cup
instructions: Mix everything together (sweet corn, spring onion cup, capsicum chopped, tomatoes, cucumber, mayonnaise, salt, white pepper and sugar) in a bowl.

recipes.name: Pasta Chicken Salad
instructions: In a bowl add chicken breast, macaroni, capsicum, sweet corn, tomato puree, ketchup, chili sauce, sugar, salt, cream and mayonnaise. Mix well.
Serve over bed of salad leaves, serve chilled.

recipes.name: Tomato, Basil and Feta Salad
ingredients: Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
instructions: In a large bowl toss together the tomatoes, cucumber, green onions, basil, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, and feta cheese.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

recipes.name: Mojito Salad
instructions: Cook sugar and water over low heat until sugar dissolve.
Stir in lime juice.
Drop mixture over fresh fruits and toss gently until fruit is lightly coated.
Sprinkle mint, toss again and serve.

recipes.name: Prawn Salsa
instructions: Finely chop capsicum, tomatoes, garlic, onion, green chilies and cucumber.
Heat oil in a wok, add in chopped garlic.
Sauté till golden brown.
Now add all the chopped vegetables, corn, lemon juice, coriander leaves, black pepper powder and salt.
Mix well and fry for a few minutes.
Lastly add boiled chopped prawns and mix well.
Dish it out and serve.

recipes.name: Yogurt Egg Salad
instructions: Cut boiled eggs into two halves and scoop out yolks.
Mash the yolk with yogurt and all other ingredients till gets creamy.
Fill this mixture into boiled egg whites with piping bag or directly.
In a bowl add macaroni, yogurt, chopped tomatoes, cucumber, capsicum, lemon juice, salt and black pepper together.
Place this mixture in the center of a serving dish.
Set egg white filled with beaten yolk and enjoy delicious healthy salad.

recipes.name: Summer Salad
instructions: Finely chop radish, green capsicum, red capsicum, green capsicum, ice berg, tomato, cucumber and parsley.
Now in a bowl mix all the chopped vegetables with boiled red and white beans.
Also chop potatoes into small cubes, add to salad mixture and mix well.
Finely chop and an apple and mix to the salad.
Separately mix together mayonnaise, fresh cream, mustard paste and lemon juice. Mix well.
Lastly in a large bowl put together all the chopped vegetables, salt, black pepper and prepared dressing. Mix all well.
Dish it out, serve chilled.

recipes.name: Cashew Chicken Mango Salad
instructions: Brush both side of chicken with virgin oil, salt and pepper
Then fry chicken for 4 to 5 minutes over a medium heat.
Remove from the heat and let it cool slightly.
Then cut chicken into the small pieces.
For Dressing: Mix lime juice, honey salt and pepper in bowl and steam in 2 tsp olive oil.
Then divide the lettuce in plates and top with cooked chicken, mangoes, avocados and 2 tsp cashews in each plate and drizzle with the dressing.
Delicious and mouth-watering cashew chicken salad is ready to serve.

recipes.name: Chipotle-Mango BBQ Chicken Salad
instructions: For the Sauce: Mix mango, chipotle pepper, adobo sauce, ketchup, apple juice, onion, garlic, lemon juice, unseasoned rice vinegar, brown sugar, canola oil, paprika, salt, black pepper into saucepan and boil over a medium heat for 15-20 minutes. Let it cool then put into blender and process until smooth.
For Dressing: Mix prepared sauce, plain Greek yogurt. Then taste it and add more lime juice, salt and pepper if necessary.

For the Salad: Marinate chicken breast into prepared sauce for at least 15 minutes or up to 3 hours. Then grill it over a medium-high heat for 5-6 minutes per side. Before slicing, remove it from the grill at least for 5 minutes. Grill corn along with the chicken, turn it every few minutes until cooked on all sides. Let it cool for a few minutes, and then slice kernels off the cob.
Divide lettuce into plates, and then top with the grilled corn, tomatoes, cilantro and chicken. Drizzle with prepared dressing.
Ready to serve.

recipes.name: Green Mango Salad
instructions: Soak mango in a bowl of ice water to make it crisp.
Using a mortar and pestle pound the dry shrimp along with the peanuts, red chili and coriander.
Add the fish sauce, lemon juice, sweet chili sauce and sugar and combine.
On a serving platter place the drained mango and toss along with the green onion pour over the mixture of all the spices and toss well.
Serve with lemon wedges and garnish with fresh coriander.

recipes.name: Chicken Minced Salad
instructions: Roast whole red chilies and crush.
In a pan, heat olive oil and add garlic paste and chicken mince and sauté briefly.
When water begins to dry up and chicken looks tender, take it off the flame.
In a mixing bowl, add mincemeat, crushed and roasted red chilies, fish sauce, chopped spring onion, chopped coriander, chopped mint and lemon juice and mix well.
Now add roasted rice and mix.
Garnish with cabbage and cucumber and serve.

recipes.name: Sweet and Sour Pasta Salad
instructions: In a large pot of boiling, salted water cook the pasta to al dente.
Drain, place in a large bowl and set aside.
To make the dressing mix together tomato, ketchup, brown vinegar, brown sugar, salad oil and salt.
Place the drained pasta in a large bowl.
Finely slice cucumber, carrot and capsicum.
Mix with the pasta along with the pineapple chunks.
Pour the dressing over the pasta.
Add lemon juice, black pepper, salt and chopped parsley.
Gently mix the salad cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Before serving garnish with stir fried almonds.

recipes.name: Mexican Bean Salad
ingredients: Haricot Beans or cannellini beans 1 can
instructions: Drain the beans and corn well and set aside in bowl.
Chop the onion, green chili, red pepper and tomato into 1 cm cubes. Mix with the beans.
And season lightly with salt and pepper.
To make the dressing beat the oil, lime juice, zest of 1 lime, oregano and salt and pepper and sugar until well combined.
Pour over salad toss well to combine and allow it to sit for 15 to 20 minutes
Now before serving, garnish with coriander and serve.

recipes.name: Chicken and Rice Salad
ingredients: Rice long white kernel cooked & cooled 1 cup - for salad
Chicken diced, cooked 1 cup - for salad
instructions: In a large bowl combine cooked rice, chicken, cheese and celery
Toss to mix In a small bowl combine dressing ingredients
Blend well
Pour over rice mixture
Toss to coat
To serve, place 1 cup lettuce on each of 4 plates
Spoon rice mixture evenly onto lettuce with cucumber

recipes.name: Noodles & Black Olive Salad
ingredients: Celery leaves (for garnish) can be alternated with lettuce leaves
instructions: Take the mayonnaise and combine with the cream.
Take the boiled broken noodles and place in a salad bowl, add the creamed mayonnaise and toss the salad well.
Add olives, pepper apd and celery leaves and chill for at least 30 minutes

recipes.name: Pomegranate and Rocket Salad
ingredients: Virgin olive oil 1/4 cup - for dressing
Salt and pepper to taste - for dressing
instructions: Mix all the ingredients for the dressing and gradually add the oil.
To serve layer the leaves and pomegranate
Now finish with some crumbled cheese, caramel walnuts and the dressing and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken and Macaroni salad
ingredients: Chicken Breast boneless 2, boil and chop in small pieces
Almonds 1/2 cup, peeled and broken in two
instructions: Boil the macaroni according to package instructions drain and rinse in cold water.
Combine the macaroni in a large bowl with the pineapple bits and the syrup.
Then add all other ingredients and mix well.
Chill for several hours.
Tastes best when very cold.

recipes.name: Medley of Fruits with Candied Rose
ingredients: Fresh orange or sweet lime juice 1 cup
instructions: Scoop out watermelon into small balls, using a parisienne scoop.
Scoop out pineapple also into small balls.
Scoop apples into small sized balls and sprinkle with lemon juice and mix well.
Peel pomegranate and separate the pomegranate pearls.
Peel orange, deseed, remove the white pith and cut the segments into two.
Mix candied rose petals (Gulkand) with fresh orange juice or fresh sweet lime juice.
Arrange the fruits in a serving plate decoratively and refrigerate.
Just before serving place candied rose petal and fresh juice mixture onto the arranged fruits.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Mixed Sprouts and Cucumber Salad
instructions: Place the tomatoes in a mixing bowl.
Rinse & drain mixed sprouts and add them to tomatoes with red onion and cucumber.
Mix together the olive oil, lemon juice and cumin seeds and pour over the salad.
Stir in the chopped herbs and season well before serving.

recipes.name: Black-Eyed Beans with Leeks Salad
ingredients: Fresh lemon thyme 1 tbsp or Dried thyme leaves 1 tsp
instructions: Place the beans in a large pan and cover with water.
Bring to the boil, reduce heat and simmer for about 40 minutes.
Slice the leeks (use the white and tender green parts only, discard the tough, outer green leaves).
Heat the oil in a large pan, add the garlic and leeks and cook, covered, over low heat for 4-5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the mustard, cider, drained beans and thyme to the garlic and leek mixture.
Cover and continue cooking for about 15 minutes, or until the beans are tender but not mushy.
Sprinkle with the parsley and serve.

recipes.name: Chopped Egg & Cucumber Salad
instructions: Take the hard boiled eggs and mash roughly with mayonnaise, chicken stock, 1 cucumber, white pepper and crème.
Then in a plate arrange the sliced cucumbers, place the egg mixture in the middle and top with crème.
Garnish with black olives.

recipes.name: Cold Chicken Salad
ingredients: Chicken Breast boneless 2, boiled and cubed
Green peas 1 cup, shelled and boiled
Apples 2 chopped and sprinkled with sugar and lemon
Capsicums 2, remove seeds and white pith, chop fine
Almonds 10-12 peeled, roasted separated in tow
Raisins 10, soak in hot water and roast on tawa
White flour 3 tbsp - for white sauce
White pepper 1 tsp, powdered - for white sauce
Salt to taste - for white sauce
instructions: Heat butter in a small pan, add sifted white flour and stir till it changes color slightly. Remove from heat.
After five minutes pour milk in it and stir constantly.
Put the pan back on heat; continue to stir till the sauce thickens.
Remove from heat and add salt and pepper; let it cool.
Combine fruit and vegetables, almonds, sugar and salt in a large bowl.
Add the white sauce and cream.
Mix well. Sprinkle raisins on top.

recipes.name: Kachoomber Salad
instructions: Thinly slice or chop into thin chunks the cucumber, onion and tomato, combine in a medium bowl.
Add the lemon juice, salt and pepper and mix well.
Adjust seasoning as necessary.
When ready to serve, garnish with the cilantro.

recipes.name: Mediterranean Salad
instructions: Take off the leaves of ice lettuce roughly.
Add salt, black pepper in some olive oil.
Also add vinegar and garlic in olive oil mixture.
Mix all the ingredients well.
Now add tomatoes, olives, onion and sun ripe tomatoes.
Also add cottage cheese.
Pour the olive oil mixed dressing on top of it.
The salad is ready to be served.

recipes.name: Lebanese Salsa
instructions: Take a large bowl and mix chopped tomato, parsley and garlic.
Also mix green chilli, lemon juice and olive oil.
Add salt and pepper and mix well.
Serve the salsa as an accompaniment to any food.

recipes.name: Farfalle Salad
instructions: For boiling pasta, fill a pan with water and add a pinch of salt and 2 tbsp oil.
Add pasta and boil for 8-10 minutes.
Drain out water when boiled and wash under with running cold water.
Take a bowl and put boiled cold pasta in it.
Now add boiled chicken, tomato, capsicum, cucumber, sweet corn, olives, carrot, crushed red chilies, crushed black pepper and mayonnaise.
Mix well. Decorate with tomato flower and serve.

recipes.name: Fish Salad
ingredients: Egg yolks 2 large - for red pepper mayonnaise
Dijon mustard 1 tbsp - for red pepper mayonnaise
Olive oil 250 ml - for red pepper mayonnaise
Balsamic vinegar 2 tbsp - for red pepper mayonnaise
Sugar 1 tsp - for red pepper mayonnaise
Lemon juice 1 tbsp - for red pepper mayonnaise
Red pepper, roasted 2 - for red pepper mayonnaise
instructions: Marinate fish in salt, pepper and lemon juice for 3-4 hours.
Grill till done and golden brown, basting with oil.
To prepare red pepper mayonnaise: In a food processor, blend yolks until thickened.
Add mustard.
With food processor still running, add oil in a steady stream until mixture thickens and emulsifies.
Add vinegar, sugar, salt and freshly-ground pepper to taste, lemon juice and 1 tbsp boiling water to set it.
Process red pepper until smooth and fold into mayonnaise.
Store in refrigerator in a screw-top jar until required.
Make slits on the fish and pour mayonnaise over it.
Serve warm with a fresh salad.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
ingredients: Grainy Mustard paste 1 tsp - for salad dressing
Grated Parmesan 3 tbsp - for salad dressing
White Vinegar 1/2 tsp - for salad dressing
Sour cream 1 tbsp - for salad dressing
Salt to taste - for salad dressing
Black pepper to taste - for salad dressing
Olive oil as required - for salad dressing
Garlic ground 1 clove - for salad dressing
instructions: Whip all the ingredients of salad dressing together.
Coat chicken with oregano, salt and black pepper and grill on a pan till done.
Serve salad with lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan, topped with the grilled chicken.

recipes.name: Sweet Corn and Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: Raisin 1 packet (soaked in warm water and then lightly fried)
instructions: Combine sweet corn, black pepper, salt, sugar, lemon juice and fried raisins, mix well.
Cut the cottage cheese in cubes and fry them lightly.
Add the cheese to the corn and then add chopped mint leaves.
Leave to cool and serve.

recipes.name: Chicken Tandoori Salad
ingredients: Chicken boneless (cut into 1 inch cubes) 1 cup
Garlic paste 1 tsp leveled - for dressing
instructions: Marinate the chicken cubes with garlic, salt, chili powder, pinch of orange color, lemon juice, yogurt and oil.
Now pan fry in 1 tbsp oil till chicken is tender for about 10 minutes.
Remove and put a inflamed coal with chicken on silver foil.
Drop some oil on coal, cover tightly for 1 minute.
In a bowl mix together iceberg lettuce, capsicum, tomato, cucumber, onions, red kidney beans, green olive and black olives.
Mix in the grilled chicken cubes.
Just before serving add in the blended dressing.
Serve on a platter.
For Dressing: In blender put together oil, garlic paste, white vinegar, salt, mustard powder and black pepper.
Blend for 2 minutes.

recipes.name: Tuna Salad
instructions: Take out tuna fish from can, put into the strainer to strain the oil out of it.
Take a bowl, put strained tuna fish into the bowl.
Now cut onion, cucumber, tomato, capsicum into small cubes. Cut green chili and lettuce.
Season with olive oil, salt, pepper and lemon juice.
Mix all ingredients properly.
Serve it on a platter with garlic toast.

recipes.name: Raw Vegetable Salad
instructions: In a mixing bowl add carrots, cucumber, tomatoes and onion rings.
Then add chopped coriander, lettuce leaves and chopped green chilies, toss well.
Now squeeze in lemon juice and sprinkle salt.
Toss and serve.

recipes.name: Potato and Pineapple Salad
instructions: In a bowl, add potato, egg, cucumber, pineapple pieces, cream, black pepper, icing sugar, salt and mayonnaise; mix them properly together.
Take it out in a platter and garnish with peanut before serving.
Delicious Potato and Pineapple Salad is ready to serve.

recipes.name: Beef Steak Salad
instructions: Take the under - cut meat cut into thin slices, marinade with salt, pepper, 1 tbsp olive oil & mustard paste for 30 minutes.
Take Ice-berg lettuce, tear the lettuce leaves with your hands, wash and dip into chilled water.
Julienne cut the bell peppers.
Add them to the bowl of lettuce.
Take grill pan or frying pan, and heat on a medium flame.
Grill the marinated beef steaks from both the sides, cook till soft & tender, remove from the grill, and leave it to cool.
Now julienne cut the beef and add to the lettuce bowl, add salt & pepper for seasoning, 1 tbsp olive oil, balsamic vinegar, tomato wedges, toss well.
Serve in a deep platter.

recipes.name: Chicken Pasta Salad
ingredients: Black pepper ½ tsp - for dressing
Mustard seeds ½ tsp - for dressing
instructions: In a bowl, add pasta, chicken, tomatoes, salad leaves, capsicum and almonds and mix it together.
Then in a different bowl, beat together mayonnaise, milk, sugar, poppy seeds, black pepper, mustard seeds, salt and vinegar and pour it on the salad.
Garnish with coriander or parsley and serve.

recipes.name: Corn Salad
instructions: Prepare barley according to package directions. Let cool.
Combine barley, corn, onion and peppers together in a large bowl.
To prepare dressing combine lime peel, juice, vinegar, oil, salt and dill in a small bowl.
Whisk to blend. Pour dressing over corn mixture. Toss well.
Cover and refrigerate.

recipes.name: Macaroni, Corn and Basil Salad
ingredients: Tomatoes, cut into thin wedges 4 medium
English hothouse cucumber 1 cup thin slices
Fresh corn kernels or frozen, thawed 1 cup
instructions: Boil salted water in medium saucepan.
Add macaroni to boiling water just until tender but still firm. Drain.
Rinse under cold water. Drain well.
Place macaroni in large bowl.
Add tomatoes, green onions, cucumber and corn.
Combine basil, yogurt, mayonnaise, lime juice and garlic in processor until basil is finely chopped.
Mix basil dressing with macaroni mixture and toss to blend.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Cover and refrigerate.

recipes.name: BBQ Pasta Salad
ingredients: Boneless chicken, cut in small cubes 1/4 kg
Shell pasta, boiled 2 cups - for pasta salad
Cabbage, shredded 3 cups - for pasta salad
Green peas, boiled 1 cup - for pasta salad
Lettuce leaves, finely chopped 3 - for pasta salad
Fresh cream 6 tbsp - for salad dressing
Cold milk 5 tbsp - for salad dressing
Black pepper powder 1/2 tsp - for salad dressing
Salt to taste - for salad dressing
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C.
Marinate the chicken in lemon juice, green chillies, chilli powder, salt and garlic powder for 20 minutes.
Grill the marinated chicken in pre-heated oven till chicken becomes soft and crisp.
Remove from oven and set aside.
In a bowl, mix fresh cream, milk, mayonnaise, salt and black pepper and beat well.
Combine cabbage, peas, grilled chicken, boiled pasta and lettuce leaves in a large salad bowl.
Pour the dressing on the salad and mix well.
Garnish with lettuce leaves and chill in refrigerator until ready to serve.

recipes.name: Tomato Salad
instructions: Cut medium-sized tomatoes into 1/4 inch thick slices.
Cut each plum tomato and yellow cherry tomato in half.
Chop enough chives to measure 1 tablespoon.
Reserve remaining chives for garnish.
Squeeze juice from lime into small bowl.
Stir in chopped chives, orange juice and salt.
Arrange sliced tomatoes around rim of platter.
Pile plum tomatoes and yellow cherry tomatoes in center of platter.
Drizzle salad with dressing, sprinkle with pepper.
Garnish with lime slices and reserved chives

recipes.name: Coleslaw Salad
ingredients: Black pepper, freshly ground, to taste
instructions: Fold first 5 ingredients together in a large bowl with wooden spoon.
Chill and serve with a garnish of freshly ground black pepper.
Serve with outdoor-cooked foods.

recipes.name: Spinach and Orange Salad
ingredients: Black pepper to taste - for dressing
instructions: Slice the top and bottom off each orange, then remove the peel carefully and slice the segments.
Save the juice for salad dressing.
In a salad tray mix together spinach leaves, orange segments and scatter the chopped onions over the salad.
To make the dressing, whisk together oil, orange and lemon juice, salt and pepper in a bowl.
Pour the dressing over the salad just before serving.
Toss the salad well to coat the leaves with the dressing.

recipes.name: Carrot Raisin Salad
ingredients: Salt & pepper to taste - for vinaigrette
instructions: Mix the carrots in a bowl along with the raisins, sugar, salt and chill in the refrigerator.
Combine all the ingredients for the vinaigrette in a jar with a well-fitting lid and shake to combine thoroughly.
Pour the desired quantity of dressing over the salad and store the rest in the jar in the refrigerator.

recipes.name: Beetroot and Orange Salad
ingredients: Orange rind, finely grated 1/2 tsp - for dressing
instructions: Slice the top and bottom off each orange and remove the skin and pith.
Holding the orange over a bowl, carefully slice the segments.
Collect the juice in the bowl and leave to chill.
Place the segments in a separate bowl.
Dice the beetroot into small cubes, mix with the orange segments and leave to chill.
In a bowl mix rice with orange juice and season with salt and pepper.
In a salad plate spoon over rice and top with the beetroot and orange mixture.
Mix all the dressing ingredients together and spoon over the salad or serve separately in a bowl.

recipes.name: Apple Pineapple Salad
ingredients: Roasted Cumin Seeds 1/2 tsp - for dressing
Red Chilli Flakes 1/2 tsp - for dressing
instructions: Mix together all the ingredients for the dressing along with 2 tbsp of water.
Mix together prepared apple, pineapple & orange.
Add the dressing & toss well to mix.
Serve garnished with roughly torn mint leaves.

recipes.name: Prawns & Mango Salad
instructions: Halve the tomatoes, remove the seeds and cut into strips.
Marinate prawns in green coriander chutney for about fifteen minutes.
Heat a pan and cook prawns till they are done.
Mix together mango, tomato, mustard paste, salt, crushed peppercorns, lemon juice and one tablespoon of water.
Add the cooked prawns and toss to mix.
Serve on a bed of chilled, crisp lettuce.

recipes.name: Rajma Salad
ingredients: Green Chillies(finely chopped) 1/2 tsp - for dressing
Red kidney beans(soaked overnight and boiled) 1 cup
instructions: Combine all the ingredients together in a salad bowl.
Keep refrigerated. Just before serving add the dressing and toss well.
Serve immediately garnished with cheese and cherry tomatoes.

recipes.name: Mixed Bean Salad
ingredients: Black pepper powder 1/2 tsp - for dressing
instructions: Take a bowl and pour in lemon juice.
Add salt, chaat masala, crushed black pepper, garlic paste & olive oil and mix well.
Add chick peas, rajma, black eyed beans, onion, tomato, green chilies & coriander leaves.
Mix them all and serve.

recipes.name: Egg and Tuna Salad
instructions: Drain and flake tuna fish. Slice the eggs.
Drain the mandarin oranges and olives and slice olives.
Mix these ingredients together lightly.
For dressing blend lemon juice and soya sauce into oil and season with salt, pepper and sugar.
Pour over the salad and leave to marinate in the refrigerator for 10 minutes.
Divide the salad between 4 glass dishes and garnish with sprigs of parsley.

recipes.name: Salad with Chili and Peanuts Dressing
ingredients: Curry powder 1 1/2 tsp - for peanut dressing
Ground cumin 1 tsp - for peanut dressing
Plain flour 1 tsp - for peanut dressing
Sweet chilly sauce 2 tbsp - for peanut dressing
Crunchy peanuts 1/2 cup - for peanut dressing
Brown sugar 1 tbsp - for peanut dressing
Coconut cream 400 ml - for peanut dressing
Medium onion finely chopped - for peanut dressing
Peanuts crushed 1 cup - for peanut dressing
instructions: Boil, steam or microwave potatoes, cauliflower, carrots separately until just tender, drain, rinse under cold water, drain.
Place cabbage on plate top with cooked vegetable, sprouts, cucumber and egg, peanut dressing, and raisin.
Peanut Dressing: Heat butter in pan, add onion, cook, stirring until soft.
Next add peanuts, curry powder, cumin, flour and chilly sauce, cook, stirring 2 minutes stir in peanut crushed, sugar and coconut cream.
Simmer uncovered about 10 minutes or until slightly thickened.

recipes.name: Mango Salsa
instructions: Chopped all vegetables finely.
In a mixing bowl, mix all ingredients well except onion.
Add chopped onion before serving.
